text:
Carlos José Barisio (3 January 1951 – 5 February 2020) was an Argentine professional goalkeeper. He retired from football in 1987, after amassing 271 appearances in the Argentinian Primera. He played as a Ferro Carril Oeste player in 1981. He set the Primera record for the longest period without letting in a goal.
Barisio died on 5 February 2020 of lung cancer, aged 69.
